rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open, welcoming space that leads to the living areas. Incorporates a foyer with Vastu-compliant entry direction and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area designed for family gatherings, furnished in a Bohemian style with eclectic decor and ample seating. Windows placed to allow east-facing light according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-concept kitchen adjoining the dining area, featuring traditional Indian design elements fused with modern amenities, and positioned away from the main entrance as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with a Bohemian aesthetic, featuring comfortable seating and a layout that promotes social interactions.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated space for fitness equipped with essential gym equipment. Designed with sound insulation and ample ventilation, respecting privacy and health standards as per local building codes.

roof_tier.description: A rooftop terrace designed for leisure, featuring a Bohemian garden with seating areas and open space for relaxation. The terrace is accessible via internal staircase from the living area.
roof_tier.compliance: Complies with local building regulations and Vastu guidelines by incorporating a natural ventilation system.
